description:
At Hagginwood Elementary we are focused on fulfilling our mission “To nourish, inspire, and empower each student to prominent levels of personalized academic and social success.”

We know that it takes a community to work together to help and support our students to achieve success. Our most important partners are our parents; therefore, we have monthly Coffee and Conversation, Parent Engagement meetings, English Language Learner Committee (ELAC), School Site Council (SSC), and monthly assemblies to engage families and celebrate student achievements.
